review: As my local friend says, this is where you can get the best pizza in Ljubljana, and I guess he is right!!! The pizza was very delicious, and the service was really nice, I was served by a young attentive waiter who is extremely professional and efficient and kind. Will definitely come back again!! Thx for the wonderful experience!!
Very funny to say that I have travelled from the UK to come and find the best pizza I ever had so far and only cost me under ¬£10. ‚Ä¶

Lots of choice for vegetarian and at least one vegan option.
'Tofu' pizza was vegan and was really nice! Loved the dough too!
Servers were lovely too and definitely made up for the wet weather.
Pictured is the Tofu (vegan) pizza.

This place has a pretty cool vibe. Pizza is apparently according to reviews best in Slovenia, so we will be back for dinner.  But now just a wine. The decor is funky with great lighting.  Service was pleasant and friendly.

We ordered 2 gluten free pizzas which you pay extra 2‚Ç¨ for and tartar sauce that they forgot to give us‚Ä¶ when we got home the pizzas were too small, which they didn't mention that they will be any smaller than the regular ones‚Ä¶ after I ‚Ä¶

I got charged for a small pizza 11.40‚Ç¨ plus extra for non-gluten dough and vegan cheese. Seen from the picture the size of pizza is not big enough even for a small child, very disappointing and actually disrespectful.

I liked my lunch experience here. I think the atmosphere is cool, with various interesting songs being played, while you are munching on your pizza. I think the taste of the pizza is pretty good, and you can grab yourself a salad and soup too, with ≈°tudentski boni.

I'm a massive pizza fan! The pizza was almost great, massive need for better quality pizza toppings. The tomato's were very watery and tasteless. Smaller cherry tomato's would be better. I understand it's winter. My wife's pizza only had 3 ‚Ä¶
10/10 for this place. All the pizzas and salad were delicious. Including the Gluten free options. Freezing cold beer, awesome 80s music and extremely friendly staff. Highly recommended.

Pizza pizza time with wine and dines. The salad was half a gallon of goodness - I recommend the regular crust for the pizzas. Tip top there, but the gluten free needed longer in the fireside pizza box. Great price and tasty food.

As my local friend says, this is where you can get the best pizza in Ljubljana, and I guess he is right!!! The pizza was very delicious, and the service was really nice, I was served by a young attentive waiter who is extremely professional and efficient and kind. Will definitely come back again!! Thx for the wonderful experience!!

Cozy restaurant with nice atmosphere. Delicious pizza (even the sweet one) and good drafted beer + dog friendly.
Worth the try!

We ended up there accidentally but we saw it in Google Maps and its good rating and decided to go in. Pretty nice place, friendly stuff, although I must say I wasn‚Äôt impressed with the pizzas, definitely not up to the built expectations.

The service was amazing. The portions were big, but we got the rest of the food to go. There‚Äôs also an option to add more veggies to your food and you get water, cherry juice and pineapple juice for free.

The vibe in the restaurant makes you feel youngerüòÇüòÇüòÇ, mainly student customers. Despite that, very good variety off food, pasta, pizzas, fish, meat, burgers. All the staff looks happy and satisfied, good and quick service too. Very good ‚Ä¶

Not incredible, better go somewhere else. The service is long, the pasta isn't served with cheese, they don't have all that is present on the card... But it has big portions, you're not hungry anymore after this. It's not bad, but it's not the best place.
I went here because they have student vouchers. Food was ok, could be better. Staff was nice and friendly.

I generally love how in Slovenia you always get with lunch either fruits or vegetables.
I had been eating here a lot and was satisfied with the menus and the overall service. The best ‚Äúnjoki‚Äù I have ever eaten for sure!
Student's restaurant with nice outdoor garden. Food is well prepared and served. Above student standards I believe.
Great place to spend  your student bonuses.
Good food but a little expensive for food that's meant for students.
Nice restaurant with delicious food. It's nice because it's near the city centre but it isn't too crowded. It offers great food and you can eat there with student food coupons.

A nice restaurant near the city centre. If the weather is nice I'd recommend sitting outside and even though the cars drive right by, it doesn't get too loud. Food is good, but wouldn't recommend their tortilla.

Full points, best pizza I've had in a long long time. Service was great and we felt welcome during our visit. I feel this was kind of a hidden gem for a tourist visiting Ljubljana their first time. The restaurant isn't really visible to the ‚Ä¶

Go-to place for burgers! And they play cool music too. Our waiter was very efficient and served us as fast as he could. The restaurant was packed with young locals at 3pm. It was super nice even though we had to eat outside in the cold. The ‚Ä¶

Pizza is delicious, the crust is really well done, fluffy and the filling super tasty.
We took Pancetta and Buffalo Prosciutto, both were great, as Italian and pizza lovers we can only recommend this place!!
The tur≈°ica burger was a bit dry but other than that the pizza was good! Especially for the price of student cupouns!

Been here multiple times and always outstanding pizza + quick and nice service. From my opinion, the best pizza in Ljubljana‚Äôs city center. Definitely a place to go! Plus they have student‚Äôs BONI, which is amazing for this quality of food.

Our burgers were fantastic! Perfectly cooked and super-tasty. One of our party had a pizza, and said it was the best she‚Äôd ever had! Praise indeed!! Great value for money and in a nice location too. Well worth the walk! ‚Ä¶
This is in my opinion the best burger bar in Ljubljana rivaled only by Pop's place and Hood burger. ‚Ä¶

We just ate at this restaurant. Was a little worried cause European burgers are just different than American burgers but I‚Äôm glad we decided to go. The burgers, the staff and the restaurant were GREAT! ‚Ä¶
Loved it! Really good food, very nice bathroom and awesome staff! Recommend it a lot! Will be back!
Very good pizza, cool location and a very nice staff. Also English speaking staff and cards. Good prices. Definitely not our last visit.

Everything is fine except the size of their pizzas. See picture. This is the smallest ‚Äúregular‚Äù size pizza I‚Äôve ever had. I really don‚Äôt get why they‚Äôd even try selling these tiny pizzas for the price of regular ones. This one was 8,50 euros. Incredible.

A very busy place, mostly with young people.

The original and first pizzeria in Ljubljana didn't disappoint. On the entrance to a concrete shopping mall the location is unique and rustic but the food is great. We had the RC Elan and Iskra which were both delicious. Ideal sized pizza for one person. Great value and good service. Only 5 min walk from old town.

it is a super busy pizzeria and the oldest in Slovenia. pizzas are quite small, but filling. they are also known for their homemade blueberry juice and it is delicious, but very sweet. waitress was very kind and it was a super fast service despite the rush. would recommend 100%.

High quality food. We were looking for a vegan meal, they adapted some vegetarian dishes to fully vegan for us. I had a vegetable wok with rice. The tapioca dessert was amazing! Ambience is relaxing, staff supper friendly.

Da Bu Da has established itself among the locals as a place with relaxing atmosphere, professional service, and reliably delicious food. Make sure to try their cocktails, they‚Äôve got the virgin kind too, and tell them about your ‚Ä¶

Food appearance: 5/5
Food taste: 4/5
Service: 3/5 ‚Ä¶

Simple, tasty and friendly atmosphere there. I've ordered fish with rice and some sencha tea. Overall, the dish was fine. The rice seemed to be a bit dry, but with sweet and sour sauce it was tasty enough. Also, I liked the tea.
The waiters speak good English, and you can pay by card or cash.

We stopped by to get some dinner! The waiter was very kind and got a table right away! We ordered some cocktails Aperol Spritz and Mojito! We ordered also some spring rolls, pad thai and they were so so  delicious! The portion of the food was also perfectly enough! Highly recommend if you are in the mood for some Thai food!
The food is okay, nothing special. The waitress was very nice. We really liked the dessert with pear and pad thai was also good. The place was quite crowded but it is nice.
Very delicious vegetarian and vegan food. And more than that. Great service, cozy atmosphere.

A very pleasant experience. Had an excellent Pad Thai and chicken curry, miso and tom yum soup for starters. All good and fresh. The vaitors were friendly as well. The atmosphere in the restaurant was welcomming. Definately recommend it.

Vegan options.  Posh atmosphere‚Ä¶..saw a few items that can be veganized on the menu including ramen soup with tofu and pad Thai, but decided to go with the vegetable jambalaya (ask for no goat cheese).  Full of vegetables with sweet soy ‚Ä¶

One of the best restaurants in Ljubljana. Friendly and accommodating staff and always very tasty food. Big portions, reasonable prices. Both interior and exterior are pleasant with nice and relaxed atmosphere. Always happy to return as they never disappoint.

Sunday? Hungry? Near BTC? Ajda Burger is a great option.

The worst hamburger ever. The meat was a good quality, but it didn't taste good.There was tooooo much babrbeque sos,but a bad one, it tasted like sugar.Once again worst hamburger ever!

The food is really delicious, especially the burgers. Very well made with great presentation. They even offer some Balkan dishes for example, ƒåevapi or Burek. Employees are very kind and the service is fast. Would recommend to anybody with an empty stomach!

Great meal, good service
Even late night  - thank you

This place is one of my favorite places to go in Slovenia. All of the staff manner are kindly. The quality of the ingeridients is high and always you taste fresh things. This is also nice to see this place keep the quality during time.
Great fit menu, tasty, big portions, great prices and friendly staff.

Good healthy food straight from the grill. Affordable price with nice staff and good service. Perfect place to go eat after the gym. Would recommend this place over any other burger place.

The burgers were quite tasty so I give a 3 stars.
Loved the burgers. The buns are toasted, the burger is juicy, and the sweet potato fries were amazing.

Good place for balkan food. Like their kabab items.
Good Balkan food, friendly staff.

Great pizza, we had Buffalo and Kra≈°ka pizza. Everything was up to standard, creamy mozzarella, soft pr≈°ut. The ambient is very nice and akin to 1900 Italy.

Great pizza with dozens of options both for meat and vegetarian. Also great beer options. Service was very professional and patient with our noisy company. Indoor setting looked great but we sat outside and the seating was very nice as well, at a very quiet side street.

As my local friend says, this is where you can get the best pizza in Ljubljana, and I guess he is right!!! The pizza was very delicious, and the service was really nice, I was served by a young attentive waiter who is extremely professional and efficient and kind. Will definitely come back again!! Thx for the wonderful experience!!

Cozy restaurant with nice atmosphere. Delicious pizza (even the sweet one) and good drafted beer + dog friendly.
Worth the try!
I ordered a gluten free pizza to go and got a very small pizza (20 cm) that tasted bad. That bad small pizza was more than 11 Eur!
Very funny to say that I have travelled from the UK to come and find the best pizza I ever had so far and only cost me under ¬£10. ‚Ä¶
